body.title: New endpoints to manage measurements
body.description: We introduced two new API endpoints to create, update and list your measurement families.

body.title: Product associations update
body.description: Starting now, enjoy some small improvements to make your life easier when you work with product associations.
body.altImg: Associations number inside the product form

body.title: Track your destination connections
body.description: You can now easily track the number of products that are sent to your destinations in the Connection dashboard.

body.title: Connection dashboard updates
body.description: The Connection dashboard has been improved with a new layout as well as the possibility to choose which connection you want to track.

body.title: Rules engine new actions and improvements
body.description: Discover the latest enhancements on the rules engine: we added two new actions, the possibility to name your rules and we also improved the rules format for associations.

body.title: Data Quality Insights made even more powerful
body.description: Data Quality Insights recommendations and grades are now also available for product models to help you ensure that all your products have enriched and consistent content. Also, our spell-check feature now supports additional languages.

body.title: Data quality improvements
body.description: To help you craft the best product information ever, Data quality insights recommendations and grades are now available for variant products and our spell-check feature supports additional languages!

body.title: New measurement units and families
body.description: We added four new measurement families: `Force`, `Angle`, `Capacitance` and `Volume Flow` to better fit your needs in terms of product modeling.

body.title: Rules engine extended capabilities
body.description: A new action and enhancements made on the copy action: easily and automatically concatenate your attributes, and now copy values from an attribute type to another attribute type.

body.title: Optimize the weight of your assets
body.description: If you need to reduce the size of your images, you can now use our new operation: `optimize_jpeg`. This transformation operation will compress your file to a jpeg.

body.title: New warning message on connection usernames
body.description: Whenever one of your connectors is not using the dedicated connection username, we now display a warning message in the main Connections screen as well as in the Connection form.
